alert.note: Alert for Leadville Vicinity, Lake County Below 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 9:00AM MST until December 22 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Leadville Vicinity/Lake County Below 11000 Feet County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST today for the Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 pm MST this evening for the Wind Chill Advisory. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Leadville Vicinity, Lake County Below 11000 Ft
